content.rendered:
Oluwadamilola’s passion for teaching knows no bounds. She enjoys a facilitating, engaging, and stimulating environment. Her background is in Psychology and Neuroscience. She graduated in University of Westminster for my BSc in Psychology and Neuroscience and MSc in Cognitive and Clinical Neuroscience at Goldsmith University of London.

Oluwadamilola has been teaching for 11 years in various educational settings and instructions teaching A- Levels, FE colleges and Higher Education Colleges. Her passion for education also lead her to acquire PGCE in Education and Training where she specialised in Adult Education at University of Westminster.

She has worked under NHS trust, Rehabilitation clinics and care homes hence my passion for Allied Health Studies. Her goal inspires learners to reach their full potential and enjoy the learning experiences. There is fantastic connection between our mental process being stimulated through the senses, experience and thought.

Subjects of Specialism include:

Psychology
Cognitive Science
Mental Health
Health and social science
Care planning in Health Care
Education and Training
CPD/ Training
Employability Skills
